camel.sink.endpoint.credentials.name: camel.sink.endpoint.credentials
camel.sink.endpoint.credentials.description: Set the storage credentials, required in most cases

camel.sink.endpoint.validateClientURI.name: camel.sink.endpoint.validateClientURI
camel.sink.endpoint.validateClientURI.description: Whether to validate the Azure client URI

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.messageTimeToLive.name: camel.sink.endpoint.messageTimeToLive
camel.sink.endpoint.messageTimeToLive.description: Message Time To Live in seconds

camel.sink.endpoint.operation.name: camel.sink.endpoint.operation
camel.sink.endpoint.operation.description: Queue service operation hint to the producer One of: [listQueues] [createQueue] [deleteQueue] [addMessage] [retrieveMessage] [peekMessage] [updateMessage] [deleteMessage]

camel.sink.endpoint.queuePrefix.name: camel.sink.endpoint.queuePrefix
camel.sink.endpoint.queuePrefix.description: Set a prefix which can be used for listing the queues

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountKe.name: camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountKey
camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountKe.description: Set the storage account key used during authentication phase

camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountNa.name: camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountName
camel.sink.endpoint.credentialsAccountNa.description: Set the storage account name used during authentication phase

camel.component.azure-queue.credentials.name: camel.component.azure-queue.credentials
camel.component.azure-queue.credentials.description: Set the storage credentials, required in most cases

camel.component.azure-queue.validateClie.name: camel.component.azure-queue.validateClientURI
camel.component.azure-queue.validateClie.description: Whether to validate the Azure client URI

camel.component.azure-queue.lazyStartPro.name: camel.component.azure-queue.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.azure-queue.lazyStartPro.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.azure-queue.messageTimeT.name: camel.component.azure-queue.messageTimeToLive
camel.component.azure-queue.messageTimeT.description: Message Time To Live in seconds

camel.component.azure-queue.operation.name: camel.component.azure-queue.operation
camel.component.azure-queue.operation.description: Queue service operation hint to the producer One of: [listQueues] [createQueue] [deleteQueue] [addMessage] [retrieveMessage] [peekMessage] [updateMessage] [deleteMessage]

camel.component.azure-queue.queuePrefix.name: camel.component.azure-queue.queuePrefix
camel.component.azure-queue.queuePrefix.description: Set a prefix which can be used for listing the queues

camel.component.azure-queue.basicPropert.name: camel.component.azure-queue.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.azure-queue.basicPropert.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.azure-queue.credentialsA.name: camel.component.azure-queue.credentialsAccountKey
camel.component.azure-queue.credentialsA.description: Set the storage account key used during authentication phase

camel.component.azure-queue.credentialsA.name: camel.component.azure-queue.credentialsAccountName
camel.component.azure-queue.credentialsA.description: Set the storage account name used during authentication phase
